name: Perfect Slayer
entries: At 20th level, as an action, you can empower your body to become the perfect hunter. Your body adapts to better hunt the Quarry of your oath. The transformation lasts 1 minute.You gain the following benefits:

items: You make any saving throws against your Quarry at advantage. In addition, if they force you to make Dexterity saving throws you take half damage on a failed save, and no damage on a success.
You are immune to the fear and charmed conditions.

Whenever a creature, other than you, succeeds on a saving throw while benefiting from your Slayer’sProtection the creature that forced them to make the saving throw takes psychic damage equal to yourCharisma Modifier.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
